anidbcmdc.util
Class WebsiteParser

java.lang.Object
  anidbcmdc.util.WebsiteParser

public class WebsiteParser
extends java.lang.Object

Title: WebsiteParser

Description: Downloads a website and searches for data surrounded by two Strings. This class is just a container for static methods.

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2005

Version:
1.0
Author:
ExElNeT

websiteToString

public static java.lang.String websiteToString(java.lang.String url)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
Downloads the source of a website into a String.

Parameters:
url - - The url to the websiste.
Returns:
- The source of the website.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - - If the connection to the website failed.

findDataInWebsite

public static java.lang.String findDataInWebsite(java.lang.String websiteSource,
                                                 java.lang.String start,
                                                 java.lang.String end)
Searches for data in a website surrounded by two Strings.

Parameters:
websiteSource - - The source of the website.
start - - The String in front of the data.
end - - THe String right after the data.
Returns:
- The data between the start and end Strings.
